about_the_game:
🍵 Let’s get cozy

Love comes to those who click in this casual idler. Get a random new waifu every 24 hours, some are ultra-rare! 

Test the limits of your tapping skills to grow your affection levels with headpats and speed up your next unlock.

👰‍♀️Build the ultimate collection

Each waifu has their own personality and unique dialogue. Meet Yanderes, dommy mommies, Goth gfs, and more. 

With new Waifus and features being added every other update, you’ll always have the chance to find the anime girl of your dreams. 

💘The Economy of Waifus
Every Waifu can be traded and sold on Steam Community Market with no extra fees. If you’re lucky, you can earn valuable ultra-rare and limited edition Waifus that bring future rewards and bonuses.

With a loot system designed by a professional economist, we want to make Waifus the best collectibles on Steam!

🌸 Low system requirements

Waifu can run on any machine, and can be minimized to idle with minimal RAM and CPU usage

👀 This is just the beginning!

Waifu is simple now, but ongoing content updates will bring many new life sim features.

● Deeper dialogue system and more ways to interact with Waifus

● New progression mechanics, featuring Crafting, gifts, and new loot

● Extra unlocks, including "special" pics 😘

● Marriage and eternal love 💍

~ I can’t wait to meet you, anon~

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: GTX 460 or Radeon HD 6770
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Storage: 1 GB available space
